author: Matt Simon
title: The Biggest Coronavirus Myths, Busted
description: No, drinking water won’t flush the virus out of your mouth. Here’s how to inoculate yourself against bad Covid-19 information.
content: Were living in uncertain, surreal times, as the coronavirus crisis worsens in the United States. As were struggling with a vacuum of reliable information, coronavirus myths are spreading as quickly as the disease, amplified by social media. Luckily, weve got … [+1784 chars]
